version_description:
Thank you for using Shift Keyboard! In this release:

- Shift Keyboard is now available on Apple Watch! Simply add the app to your Apple Watch and start typing! You can then send text you've typed via the Messages app. There's built in support for numbers, punctuation and emoji too!

If you find Shift Keyboard useful, please consider leaving a positive review! Please email info@adamfoot.uk if you experience any issues.

Shift Keyboard is updated regularly to provide you with the best experience. This update contains the following new features and improvements:

- Shift Keyboard is now available in Polish (thanks Bartosz) and Arabic (thanks هيثم) - bringing the total up to 10! Want Shift Keyboard to be localised in your language? Email info@adamfoot.uk

- Improved Czech translations (thanks Ondrej).


If you find this app useful, please consider leaving a positive review - every review helps! If you have a suggestion, issue or for anything else, please contact info@adamfoot.uk and I’ll aim to get back to you as soon as possible.

Shift Keyboard is updated regularly to provide you with the best experience. This update contains the following new features and improvements:

- The keyboard layout has been improved to make typing even better! Changes won't be immediately visible but extra spacing and slightly larger keys should improve your experience.

- The Settings menu has been redesigned with a fresh new look! Keyboard Mode & Type have combined in a new Layout page.

- The Setup process has been improved to include swiping views instead of tapping buttons. This should speed up the setup process for new users.


If you find this app useful, please consider leaving a positive review - every review helps! If you have a suggestion, issue or for anything else, please contact info@adamfoot.uk and I’ll aim to get back to you as soon as possible.

Shift Keyboard is updated regularly to provide you with the best experience. This update contains the following new features and improvements:

- Recent Emojis: Shift Keyboard will now keep a list of your 10 most recent emoji and offer them as suggestions when you tap the emoji button for quick access!

- Hold Backspace: You can now hold down the backspace key to erase characters automatically instead of tapping multiple times. Don't forget, you can always clear the full message by using Force Touch!


You may have missed:

- The keyboard layout has been improved to make typing even better! Changes won't be immediately visible but extra spacing and slightly larger keys should improve your experience.

- The Settings menu has been redesigned with a fresh new look! Keyboard Mode & Type have combined in a new Layout page.

- The Setup process has been improved to include swiping views instead of tapping buttons. This should speed up the setup process for new users.


If you find this app useful, please consider leaving a positive review - every review helps! If you have a suggestion, issue or for anything else, please contact info@adamfoot.uk and I’ll aim to get back to you as soon as possible.

This update contains the following new features and improvements:

- Complication: Updated Complication design.

- App Icon: Updated app icon.

You may have missed:

- Correction: Shift Keyboard will now automatically attempt to correct spelling errors you may have made whilst typing. Not the correct suggestion? Keep typing or turn the Digital Crown to select another suggestion - including your original word!

- Settings: Added a Correction toggle to the Settings menu so you can disable the new automatic correction feature if you don't find it useful.

- Other bug fixes & improvements.


Enjoying this app? Please consider leaving a positive review - every review helps!

Something not right? Email info@adamfoot.uk and I’ll get right back to you.

This update contains bug fixes & minor improvements.


You may have missed:

- Always Capitalised: Enable under Settings > Layout to always show uppercase keys when typing. Use the shift key to check if you're typing in uppercase or lowercase.

- Swipe to Type: This releases adds the ability for you to swipe words to type instead of tapping to enter a character. Haptic feedback will confirm you've entered the character. Just release to add the word to your message!

Shift Keyboard will use a unique algorithm to determine which word you've swiped - if it's incorrect, you can use the Digital Crown to swipe through other possibilities!


Also in this version:

- Tips: Firmly press on the screen, select Info and then Tips to view a few tips and tricks to help you use Shift Keyboard.

- Text Suggestions: The Text Suggestions Engine has been upgraded to be quicker and better than ever.

- Other Improvements: With each release, Shift Keyboard is updated with the latest bug fixes & optimisations to make your typing experience even smoother.


Enjoying this app? Please consider leaving a positive review - every review helps!

Something not right? Email info@adamfoot.uk and I’ll get right back to you.

- Other Improvements: With each release, Shift Keyboard is updated with the latest bug fixes & optimisations to make your typing experience even smoother.


Enjoying this app? Please consider leaving a positive review - every review helps!

Something not right? Email info@adamfoot.uk and I’ll get right back to you.

This update contains bug fixes & minor improvements.


You may have missed:

- Always Capitalised: Enable under Settings > Layout to always show uppercase keys when typing. Use the shift key to check if you're typing in uppercase or lowercase.

- Swipe to Type: This releases adds the ability for you to swipe words to type instead of tapping to enter a character. Haptic feedback will confirm you've entered the character. Just release to add the word to your message!

Shift Keyboard will use a unique algorithm to determine which word you've swiped - if it's incorrect, you can use the Digital Crown to swipe through other possibilities!


Also in this version:

- Tips: Firmly press on the screen, select Info and then Tips to view a few tips and tricks to help you use Shift Keyboard.

- Text Suggestions: The Text Suggestions Engine has been upgraded to be quicker and better than ever.

- Other Improvements: With each release, Shift Keyboard is updated with the latest bug fixes & optimisations to make your typing experience even smoother.

This update contains the following new features and improvements:

- Added the QWERTZ keyboard layout.
- You’ll now see a message the first time you tap send telling you how to get back to the app quickly.
- Other bug fixes & improvements.


The following new languages are now supported for text suggestions and auto-correct:

Albanian, Basque, Bosnian, Breton, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Norwegian, Norwegian Bokmal, Romanian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Swedish


If you’d like Shift Keyboard fully localised in your language and you’re able to translate, please email info@adamfoot.uk.
